H430.def: plural with plural meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

H954.def: = state in which someone has forfeited the respect of the community, due to a situation that is not in accordance to someone's status

H341.def: = state in which someone is engaged in a conflict with  someone else and acts accordingly

H1571.def: marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied)

H6960.def: = state in which humans are confident that their longing will be fulfilled

H954.def: = state in which someone has forfeited the respect of the community, due to a situation that is not in accordance to someone's status

H898.def: = pattern of behavior by which humans act in a way which shows a lack of truthfulness and commitment, both in words and deeds

H3045.def: = process by which humans or deities acquire information about other humans, deities, or certain facts, which is stored in the mind

H1870.def: = an open space connecting different places, ► used for travelling and transportation; ≈ often extended to denote our life as a journey from birth to death, and the totality of our activities during our lives

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H3925.def: = process by which humans or animals acquire knowledge or skill from an identified or unidentified source, ► which usually results in a specific behavior or skill

H734.def: = relatively narrow {L:road<SDBH:דֶּרֶךְ>} that connects two locations and facilitates travelling

H1869.def: = action by which humans or animals move forward by lifting and setting down each foot in turn

H571.def: = state in which humans and deities are considered worthy of trust, because they are truthful and committed, with an unwavering disposition, which is reflected in their words and actions

H3925.def: = process by which humans or animals acquire knowledge or skill from an identified or unidentified source, ► which usually results in a specific behavior or skill

H430.def: plural with plural meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations

H3468.def: = a state in which a human or deity helps a human in need to be safe / a safe state

H3117.def: = the time of day that it is light, as opposed to the time that it is dark

H6960.def: = state in which humans are confident that their longing will be fulfilled

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H7356.def: = state in which humans feel compassion for others, ◄ caused by affection for that person and/or the lack of well-being of that person; ► this feeling is usually translated into action

H2617.def: = state in which humans or deities are committed towards fulfilling their obligations and show that by their actions; these obligations include responsibilities towards kinspeople, spouses, friends, covenant partners, and people to whom one is indebted as a result of favors received

H5769.def: = a long duration of time that is or may seem unending, whether in the past or in the future

H6588.def: = action by which humans or groups defy an authority or a standard of behavior; by extension, can also refer to the punishment or guilt incurred from a trangression

H2617.def: = state in which humans or deities are committed towards fulfilling their obligations and show that by their actions; these obligations include responsibilities towards kinspeople, spouses, friends, covenant partners, and people to whom one is indebted as a result of favors received

H2898.def: = state in which objects are of a high quality and/or a pleasure to look at

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H3477.def: = state in which objects are without a bend or curve

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H2400.def: = state in which a human being is responsible for a specified or implied offence, ► which results in a state of guilt which may require atonement, restitution, and retribution

H1870.def: = an open space connecting different places, ► used for travelling and transportation; ≈ often extended to denote our life as a journey from birth to death, and the totality of our activities during our lives

H1869.def: = action by which humans or animals move forward by lifting and setting down each foot in turn

H6035.def: = state of persons who are suffering and unable to help themselves ◄ because of their own need or status, or the result of someone else's behavior ≈ often used positively of persons who are sincere and not arrogant in their behavior

H4941.def: = a situation where one party has a dispute with another party, and is looking for a legal ruling in which they receive what they consider to be rightfully theirs

H3925.def: = process by which humans or animals acquire knowledge or skill from an identified or unidentified source, ► which usually results in a specific behavior or skill

H5341.def: = action by which humans or deities carefully observe an object or event for a longer period of time

H1285.def: = a solemn agreement between two or more parties (persons, groups, nations, deities) with stipulations, blessings, and curses

H8034.def: = one or more words by which a person, deity, place or object is known, addressed, remembered, or referred to; ≈ regarded as a core element of one's identity

H5771.def: = a deed of deliberate wrongdoing resulting in a state of guilt which requires punishment

H7227.def: = state in which an object is very large in size

H3373.def: = state in which humans experience fear

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H1870.def: = an open space connecting different places, ► used for travelling and transportation; ≈ often extended to denote our life as a journey from birth to death, and the totality of our activities during our lives

H977.def: = action by which someone makes a selection among several options, which include humans, divine beings, animals, other objects, or events

H5315.def: = the part of the body connecting the head to the rest of the body and containing the passageways for blood, air, and food; ≈ associated with breathing, appetite, and life and often used metonymically to refer to the entire body and the personality inhabiting it

H2233.def: = a flowering plant’s unit of reproduction, capable of developing into another such plant, in some cases also used as food

H3423.def: = process by which humans gain ownership of land and other possessions, which often implies that these possessions will be passed on to the next generation

H776.def: = the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

H5475.def: = a group or gathering of persons (like friends or members of the same group) or heavenly beings

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H3318.def: = action by which humans, animals, or objects leave a certain place or position

H7272.def: = the lower part of the lower limb of the body of humans, animals, and --by extension-- of deities, which in some contexts may include the full leg; ► used for standing and walking; ≈ associated with authority, and also used as a euphemism for the male genitals

H7568.def: = net of unknown size and shape; ► used for hunting birds and other animals, and also for fishing; ≈ associated with aggression and control

H6437.def: = action by which humans or animals turn their body to face a direction different from the one they were facing before

H2603.def: = state in which humans or deities are favorably disposed to (other) humans, and act accordingly

H589.def: = referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse

H3173.def: = state in which humans are not part of a larger group or community

H6041.def: = a class of people who are suffering, often because of poverty but also because of an oppressive external situation; ≈ associated with humility

H6869.def: = a process by which humans go through extremely difficult circumstances, resulting in severe anxiety, ◄ as if one were confined to a narrow and cramped space from which there is no escape

H3824.def: = the organ located in the centre of the human body that pumps the blood through our circulatory system, ≈ seen as the seat of knowledge, human reasoning, planning, intelligence, skill, affection and hatred, desire and satisfaction, humility and pride, courage and fear, joy and grief

H7337.def: = state in which an object is large in size

H3318.def: = action by which humans, animals, or objects leave a certain place or position

H4691.def: = state in which humans experience distress

H7200.def: = process or action by which living creatures perceive something, primarily --though not necessarily exclusively-- with their eyes, either as a spontaneous incident or as the result of focusing the eyes on something

H5375.def: = process by which an object increases in height

H7231.def: = process by which people, objects, and events increase in number or frequency

H2555.def: = pattern of behavior by which humans behave aggressively towards other humans, ► usually in order to enrich oneself in one way or another

H8130.def: = state in which humans or deities experience hostility towards a person, an object, or a practice

H8104.def: = action by which humans or deities carefully observe an object or event for a longer period of time

H5315.def: = the part of the body connecting the head to the rest of the body and containing the passageways for blood, air, and food; ≈ associated with breathing, appetite, and life and often used metonymically to refer to the entire body and the personality inhabiting it

H5337.def: = causative action by which humans remove an object from a situation where it could be damaged

H954.def: = state in which someone has forfeited the respect of the community, due to a situation that is not in accordance to someone's status

H2620.def: = action by which humans and animals who find themselves in difficult circumstances go to a certain location, ► in order to find protection or safety

H8537.def: literally: completeness; hence: = state in which humans are considered morally blameless, with profound moral uprightness and integrity

H3476.def: = state in which humans are morally and ethically right

H6960.def: = state in which humans are confident that their longing will be fulfilled

H6299.def: = causative action by which humans exchange animals or other humans by substituting them with money or with an(other) animal, ► as a result of which they will escape death or slavery

H3478.def: = man, also known as {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Jeshurun<SDBH:יְשֻׁרוּן>}, including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of {L:Isaac<SDBH:יִצְחָק>} and {L:Rebekah<SDBH:רִבְקָה>}, brother of {L:Esau<SDBH:עֵשָׂו>}, and ► father of twelve sons -- after whom the tribes of Israel were named -- and one daughter
